description.en:
A compilation of short stories.

Nayamigoto, attara ne?
Tenryuu's life is turned upside down when he has to take care of his giddy 10-year-old daughter, Mari. Mari is excited about the arrival of a new baby half-brother, but is worried about her father being on his own. Tenryuu is exasperated by Mari's picky eating habits, fickle moods and incessant questions about making a baby. Can father and daughter ever see eye to eye? 

This is a Sakende Yaruze! side story featuring guest appearances by Shino, Nakaya, and the rest of the cast.
